title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (2) Subject to paragraph (3), these Regulations shall come into operation on
text_raw:
2021. 

(2) Subject to paragraph (3), these Regulations shall come into operation on 

the 17th day of July 2021. 

(3) Regulation 3(c) shall come into operation on the 19th day of July 2021.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 3. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19)
text_raw:
3. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 

(No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) are amended - 

(a) 

(b) 

in Regulation 1, by the substitution, in paragraph (2), of “2nd day 
of August 2021” for “19th day of July 2021”, 

in Regulation 3A, by the substitution of the following paragraph 
for paragraph (b): 

“(b) it takes place at the location referred to in column (3) of that 
Schedule opposite the mention of that event or, where more 
than one location is referred to in that column, at one of 
those locations, and”, 

(c) 

by the deletion of Regulation 4, and 

(d) by the substitution of the Schedule to these Regulations for 

Schedule 3 to those Regulations. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [369] 3 

Regulation 3A 

(4) 

Maximum 
number of 
persons 

18,000

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In SI 217 of 2021, these Regulations delete, with effect from 19 July 2021, 
Regulation 4 that provides restrictions of movement of persons in relation to 
travel from place of residence to a port or airport; update and amend the list of 
scheduled events currently provided for under the Regulations; and update the 
expiry date to 2 August 2021.
